reviews.review: Great game, a lot of fun! I really enjoy playing this with my friends. I wish it was a little more open-ended, with more gameplay options, especially in custom matches, but definitely worth a buy. The killers' mechanics are creative and engaging, and playing as a survivor is legitimately terrifying.
Once you learn it, this game absolutely slaps. It'll also really piss you off.
I am a masochist therefore I like this game and can recommend it to others like me.
Super fun game with really fun people - if you know what you're doing. Be kind to newbs! We all learn somewhere.
its so much fun a lot harder then xbox or ps4

To anyone who's a fan of online 4 v 1 horror survival games, I highly recommend this. Having played DBD for roughly 2 weeks, I have found the game to provide a satisfying challenge, which rewards intelligent play and team work. No two matches will be the same, whether that be due to the killer you face, or the perks you choose to run within your build (of which there are many to choose from, which each provide a different and interesting play style), which I think adds to the fun.  Although DBD might not be to everyone's tastes, considering the low price, I would say it's definitely work trying out.
This game once you start playing is sort of addicting
Great game, play it. Devs are somewhat listening to the community

People might say that the game is bad and has a lot of bugs etc. but i think it is really good for such a big game. The developers are actually doing their best and the game, as long as you are not a total tryhard, is really fun and pleasant. So if you are bored of multiplier fps games i recommend you try Dead by Dayight.

Fun game, great mechanics and features.

This is one of my favorite games ive ever played i have not invested a huge amount of time in it yet but i can already tell i will. Its very good for the price and will bring you a ton of fun. One downside is a lot of the killers and survivors you can play are dlc but at least for most of them you can unlock them through playtime but the one issue with unlocking them with playtime is it is a LOT of playtime for each character my guess is around 100 hours per character bc im a little above half way to unlock my first one but overall an amazing game worth picking up

honesty, with the current "hacking" problem, I wouldn't recommend this game to new players. It's a great game, but the devs have got to do something about it before I'd recommend it to anyone- especially on  PC

Bueno,como suelo ser un jugador bastante ocurrente en el juego y con 690 hrs+460 hrs en Ps4 podre dar un opinion sobre el juego.
Si eres nuevo y nunca has probado el juego antes pues te aconsejo que te prepares,porque???
1.El juego se siente como si fuera una beta(cada nueva actualizacion el juego se rompe incluso cuando le a√±aden nuevos personajes)
2.Es muy competitivo y hardcore,cuando eres survi y te toca jugar solo con un equipo de randoms es lo peor(se salva cuando juegas con amigos creeme es lo mejor)y ni te cuento cuando eres killer y te toca contra una premade.
3.Bastante desvalance por ambos bandos(seas killer o survi)
4.La experiencia sera 30% diversion - 70% sufrimiento
5.Muchas skins ,poco arreglos a los bugs
6.OMG!!!Asesinos y supervivientes de peliculas iconicas
En verdad te lo puedes pasar bien,su formula funciona pero si no quieres tener Estres Postraumatico cada vez que veas una linterna te aconsejaria que pillaras otra cosa pero si te la suda pues bienvenido a esta comunidad llega de tryhard y camperos
!LA MUERTE NO ES UNA ESCAPATORIA¬°

Exagero √© o pre√ßo de qualquer coisa nesse jogo, ele √© t√£o mal feito, mas t√£o mal feito que s√≥ vou citar um problema, crasha na minha frente e me bane uns minutos por abandono de partida... ou nerfar basicamente todos os assassinos at√© transforma-los em in√∫teis ou maquinas de matar imposs√≠veis de rivalizar, portando acostume-se a jogar com contra os mesmos 3 ou 4 assassinos

O jogo que √© absolutamente nada amig√°vel a pessoas novas, infelizmente em algum momento de del√≠rio convenci alguns amigos a jogar cmg e foi um inferno, n√£o √© nada balanceado, agora mesmo com esse novo matchmaker q joga um killer rank vermelho com sobrevivente rank cinza ou o se voc√™ estiver de killer aprendendo a jogar, prepara o brioco q vai pegar o grupo de rank vermelho mais tryhard do universo.

Mas mesmo sabendo tudo isso voc√™ ainda pensa em jogar isso, n faz isso com sua vida, gasta a grana na terapia ou em jogo gatcha de celular que seria ate menos pior

Im a college student in year 13. i spend 9 hours a day either in school or doing work after school. throughout all of these hours i spend i cant help but think about going home and playing dead by daylight. finally, i arrive home and load up my PC and open dead by daylight. i am a survivor main and when i finally get in that first game it is pure ecstasy. two minutes later im slitting my wrists. 10/10 recommend :)
